item.description:
The first of four 90 minute endurance races is on Monday, May 16th.

************************************

*** DUE TO RAIN, RACE POSTPONED TO ***

********** MONDAY JUNE 27 ***********

************************************

6:00 PM Driver Arrival, Check-In & Weigh-In
6:30 PM Drivers Meeting and Full Safety Briefing
7:30 PM Qualifying Session
8:15 PM Official Race Start
9:45 PM Official End of Race

The format may change at F1 Boston's discretion.

A minimum of 5 pit stops have to be completed during the course of the 90 minutes.  Pit stop strategies have to be devised by each team.

The top 4 teams from any one of the 4 endurance races will qualify to race in the 3 hour final on Saturday, September 17th at the F1 Outdoor track for a heavily discounted price.

 

The cost per team for the 90 minute endurance is $300. You can go with a two ($150/driver) or three ($100/driver) driver team.

Please indicate your interest by RSVP'ing and letting me know if you prefer to be in a two or three driver team.

Once the teams have been made up, you can send me a check when I send in the application to F1 Boston.

As a disclaimer - I will try as much as possible to accommodate all who respond, but please note that due to team configurations as well as availability of grid positions, I cannot guarantee a spot for everybody.

 

Feel free to email me with any questions or concerns.
item.name: 90 Minute Endurance Race
